title: Let's Connect (CRS135)
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode! A story that Chris Redd first shared on the podcast in April of 2016 about creativity and connection.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Chris Redd, Kevin Allison)
